posts.post_content:
If you walk without rhythm, you won't attract the Worms. That reference having been made, the flavor seems to rather contradict the blocklessness. Seems like it would be a -great- blocker if everyone freezes up for fear of invoking its wrath. Or at the very least if it can sense the slightest motion and attack.  
Oh, and it's weak sauce.
